statement:
Every quadratic vector field in $\mathbb{R}^2$ has a finite number of
limit cycles.[@BR]

### Historical note {#historical-note .unnumbered}

This theorem is weaker than Dulac’s theorem but at the time of the
publication of [@BR] there was a problem in the proof of Dulac’s
theorem.

[1]{} R. Bamòn: , Publ. I.H.E.S. 64 (1986), 111-142.
